body: `com.google.api.grpc:proto-google-common-protos` that is used by `StatusUtils` is not included in the shaded SDK. This causes `NoClassDefFoundErrors` or `IncompatibleClassChangeError` when using the shaded SDK and the SDK needs to convert a status to/from an exception.
title: com.google.api.grpc:proto-google-common-protos is not included in shaded SDK
